text:
My two kids have been with Swim Studio since they reached the qualified age of 4. Recently, the studio has improved its branding and safety measures by adding its logo to the swim caps, which is a great initiative.

Now, my children, who are almost 6 and 8 years old, are at Stage 1 and Stage 3, respectively. A big thank you to Coach Cindi for her patience and for making the lessons fun and enjoyable! She is a responsible coach who, despite her busy schedule, takes the initiative to send reminders to parents.

Lady coach Cindi from Swim Studio Sg she is a very patience and professional swimming coach with her passion. Parrent can safely let your children take swimming lessons at Swim Studio Sg with coach Cindi. Coach Cindi has good concentration and pays attention to the safety of the children in the water at all times. She is a very caring and professional swimming coach, and the children all like and trust her very much.  My child thoroughly enjoyed coach Cindi swimming lessons.üëçAnd my 2 little kids now really overcome obstacles to swimming ; now they can swim very well in the pool ! It seems like 2 small fish swimming in the water.

Liqi is an extremely patient and dedicated swim coach. She is successful in helping learners overcome their fear of deep water through fun and safe water activities. She practices active listening to ensure her learners learn and apply the correct method of swimming. Her reassuring approach builds confidence in swimmers and I'm glad I am a seasoned swimmer after a year of class with her when I started without much experience.
Liqi is a really good teacher, she can accurately identify the errors you‚Äôre making so you can fix them. I‚Äôd be happy to recommend her lessons to anybody :)

Really really so so so so thankful to coach Cindi for being so so so patience n welcoming to my child who‚Äôs autistic , from not being able to swim till she can swim ,she teaches very well n really guide my child Along , very prompt in answering to queries n doubts too , thank u once again coach!!
